Dear Hagop,

 

We’ve managed to obtain GIG concurrence to hold cover for an additional day till the end of day tomorrow at expiring terms and conditions.

 

We suggest binding the renewals all on the basis of the expiring details and the policies can then be endorsed to incorporate the renewal updates, once they have been complied.

 

We look forward to your reply.

 

Regards

 

Ahmad Abu-Shaaban

chunks.text:
Further to your communication with our colleagues in Dubai, please find attached the renewal quotations we have obtained from GIG for the following policies expiring on the 30th of September 2024, as per the expiring details.

 

Policy Type       : Property All Risks, Public Liability & Marine Cargo Open Cover

Policy No.         : 75/FA/30495/0/14, 75/FA/30496/0/8, 75/PL/30469/0/5, 75/PL/30468/0/8 & 76/MO/020141/01/00, 

 

Kindly note that the terms, conditions and premium rates are as expiry with respect to the Property All Risks & Public Liability policies.

 

With respect to the Marine Open Cover, the premium rate has been increased by 15% from 0.0897% to 0.103% due to a 3 year loss ratio of 184%.

 

If any of the following details / figures require updating for the renewal period, kindly provide us with the updated information so that we may obtain revised renewal terms from GIG:

 

*	Material Damage and Business Interruption Sums Insured per location / outlet 
*	Estimated annual turnover per location / outlet
*	Estimated Annual Imports / Exports

 

We look forward to your reply and if any clarifications are required, please inform us.

 

Regards

 

Ahmad Abu-Shaaban

General Insurance Manager

 



 

Nasco Qatar

Insurance Brokers
West Bay, Al Reem Tower, 14th Floor

P.O. Box 22761, Doha, Qatar

 

T +974  4008 5200  F +974 4008 5224  D +974 5006 9194

E Ahmad.Abu-Shaaban@nascoqatar.com <mailto:Ahmad.Abu-Shaaban@nascoqatar.com>
